trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>类用于存储和管理集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> class as the data type for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>类的数据类型作为其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> property is used to store any menu item bindings defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>属性用来存储为定义任何菜单项绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> class supports several ways to access the items in the collection:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>类支持多种方法可访问集合中的项：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Item%2A>索引器以直接检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>特定的从零开始索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来创建可用于循环访问集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into an array.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法以将集合的内容复制到数组。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> object by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式管理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>通过添加和删除的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。

trans-unit.source: To add menu items to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将菜单项添加到集合中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中删除节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>类包含属性和方法，可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。

trans-unit.source: To find out how many items are in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要找出多少项在集合中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定集合是否包含某一特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象在集合中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to populate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> object declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>对象以声明方式。

trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>对象以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> to append to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到集合的结尾的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象追加到集合末尾。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> was inserted in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 插入到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A> method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A>方法要追加指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到集合末尾的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add null values and duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加 null 值和重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，你可以将插入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>中通过使用特定索引处的集合对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A> method to append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A>方法要追加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到末尾的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 包含在集合中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Contains%2A>方法来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>集合中包含对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a menu item binding from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用于测试是否存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>之前执行的任务，如添加或从集合中删除菜单项绑定的对象。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> objects that receives the copied items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的数组，它从集合中接收复制的项。

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: 目标数组中开始接收复制内容的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection" /> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: 从目标数组的指定索引开始，将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection" /> 对象中的所有项复制到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的一维兼容数组。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法以将集合的内容复制到指定的从零开始的数组。

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项目。

trans-unit.source: With the array, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 与数组中，你可以然后使用数组语法访问中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来创建用于访问集合中的项的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects from the collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法以复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象从集合到一个数组。

trans-unit.source: The array is then iterated through to display the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 然后循环访问数组以显示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> to determine the index of.
trans-unit.target: 要确定其索引的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合中指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在集合中找到 <paramref name="value" />，则为第一个匹配项从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定指定的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the menu item binding is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单项绑定不是集合中，该方法将返回-1。

trans-unit.source: If the specified menu item binding appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的菜单项绑定在集合中出现多次，则返回第一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的从零开始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象添加到集合中的指定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A>方法插入指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>集合中指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add null values and duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加 null 值和重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can simply append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object to the end of the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，只需可以附加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象与使用集合的末尾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on the how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有不起作用的方式这些对象应用到中的菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object to the collection at a specific index.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到集合中特定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 位于集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object from the collection at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此索引器访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>从集合中使用数组表示法的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to access, modify, or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 索引器可以访问、 修改或替换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>直接集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object from the collection using the indexer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>中使用索引器的集合对象。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object are then updated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>然后以编程方式更新对象。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从该集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the specified menu item binding from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>方法从集合中移除指定的菜单项绑定。

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 然后按照该菜单项的所有项都将上都移以填充空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 移动项的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: The collection can contain null values, as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以包含 null 值，以及重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，可移除菜单项集合中的特定索引使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以还所有菜单项从集合中都移除使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>方法移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the menu item binding to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的菜单项绑定的索引位置（索引从零开始）。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object at the specified index location from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除位于指定索引位置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object at the specified index location from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象从集合中指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 然后按照该菜单项的所有项都将上都移以填充空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 移动项的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: The collection can contain null values, as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以包含 null 值，以及重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，你可以删除特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以还所有菜单项从集合中都移除使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object from the collection at a specific index.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>从特定索引处的集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Map.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。
